Corporate Events

If you’re planning a Corporate Event or Team-Building activity, it can be hard to know what to do! At Fast Lane all of our Corporate Events are run on the 200cc karts which are changed regularly so you know your Customers or Staff are getting the best.

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balaclava and Gloves for hygiene reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £2.00 per item.

Corporate Grand Prix Events

Corporate Hospitality at it’s finest.

Our corporate Grand Prix offers the ultimate high-octane team-building experience, igniting competition and pitting your team head-to-head in a friendly environment. With access to catering and our corporate boardroom, Fast Lane is the perfect venue for your next corporate event.

Groups will have exclusive use of the facilities for the duration of the event. If you would like exclusive use of the facility and corporate room then Call us today to find out how we can cater for your company.

All Grand Prix Events Include:

  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place
  • Bottle of bubbly for the winner

  • Grand Prix

    6 Lap Practice Session

    4 x 8 Lap Heats

    8 Lap Semi-Final

    10 Lap Final Race For Top 8 Drivers

    £45/driver16+ drivers

  • Super Prix

    8 Lap Practice Session

    4 x 10 Lap Heats

    10 Lap Semi-Final

    12 Lap Final For Top 16 Drivers

    £50/driver16+ drivers

Corporate bookings are subject to VAT at the current rate.

Bespoke Corporate Packages

Our bespoke karting events are tailored to companies looking for the ultimate team-building experience.

Our Corporate Facilities Include:

  • Catering & buffet options
  • Bottle of Moet for the winner
  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place
  • Boardroom positioned over the track
  • Support for large groups of 30+ drivers
  • Exclusive use of the facilities

Call us today to find out how we can cater for your event.

Sign up to receive the latest news, offers and discounts

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

  • Stoke On Trent
